mapper.select: SELECT s.key,s.menu_id as menuId ,m.parent_id as parentId from laky_organization_authority s LEFT JOIN laky_organization_menu m on s.menu_id=m.id where s.id in ( SELECT DISTINCT(o.authority_id) from laky_organization_user_role s RIGHT JOIN laky_organization_role_authority o on s.role_id = o.role_id where s.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
